name: Sasso
catch: A puzzle game Mensa members would enjoy
description: Eliminate adjacent identical digits. 124×9=1116, three 1s vanish. If you don't get the name, this game might not be for you.

og.title: Sasso
og.description: A calculator puzzle for Mensa minds

features.title: Eliminate digits
features.description: Use arithmetic to create adjacent identical digits. That satisfaction when they vanish.

features.title: Endless mode
features.description: Next operation predicted every 4.2 seconds. Eliminate before you overflow.

features.title: Risk for high scores
features.description: Base×Chain×Prep×Risk. Play close to 10 digits for maximum points.
